title: Announcement, An Exhibition of Young People's Art, 1991
title_raw: An Exhibition of Young People's Art
signed: Signature imprinted in black, verso, center: DESIGN: OLD EDDIE FELLA, SEEN & HEARD
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black, center, running upward, sideways: OPENING FRIDAY,/ JUNE 7,/ 5:30-8:30P.M.; across center: JUNE 7 - JUNE 30/ DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ AN EXHIBITION/ OF/ YOUNGPEOPLES ART; across center, left: GRADES 3-12 VISIONS OF PEACE:/ COORDINATED BY/ MARY PARKS; across center, right: PROFESSIONS IN THE ARTS/ GRADES 10-12/ DIRECTED BY GEORGE TYSH; across lower center: 743 BEAUBIEN,/ 3 RD F L./ DETROIT, MICHIGAN 48226/ HOURS:WED--SAT. 12-6P.M./ (313) 362-3025; across lower edge: ALSO IN THE AREA: DETROIT ARTISTS MARKET MAY 31-JUNE 28, 1991 SALON DES REFUSE I
Verso: Imprinted in black: across lower left quadrant: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ 743 BEAUBIEN/ DETROIT, MI/ 48226/ ACROSSED FROM THE/ BRICKTOWN STATION/ EQUAL OPPORTUNITY ORG./ MEMBER N.A.A.O./ WITH SUPPORT FROM/ THE/ NATIONAL ENDOWMENT FOR THE ARTS/ MICHIGAN COUNCIL OF THE ARTS/ DETROIT/ COUNCIL FOR THE ARTS; across lower right quadrant: NON-PROFIT ORG./ BILK RATE/ U.S. POSTAGE/ PAID/ DETROIT, MI/ PERMIT NO. 2960
description:
Poster announcement printed in black, for exhibition at Detroit Focus Gallery, designed to be mailed. 
Recto: Across upper half of sheet, abstract shapes of flower and feather.  Across lower half of sheet, lined paper, one piece on top of the other, text giving exhibition title, location, dates, times, contact and additional information.  
Verso: Across lower half of sheet, lined paper, text giving sponsors and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, An Exhibition of Young People's Art, 1991. Offset lithograph on off-white paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-16
